Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

My name is Charlie and I just started playing this wonderful game a few days ago. So far I'm having a blast but I am having a little trouble with some of the missions, like taking EVA samples from different sectors. Also I've noticed that building planes are a real pain. Other than that I'm figuring everything out and am loving this game.

Welcome aboard! Don't you worry, things will get easier with practice. And always take the advice in my signature: Check out the Gameplay Questions forum if you need a helping hand. Everybody here is always willing to help out!

Yes, building planes is a real pain. KSP was originally a rocket simulator.

Contracts frequently don't make sense - going to space, the moons and other planets is easier than "discovering" the wheel (or ladder!) with the current, insane, tech-tree.
